SearchStockerCurrentState.MainSQL: SELECT e.EQUIPMENT_ID AS EQPTID, e.USE_FLAG AS YN, E.LANE_ID, ei.EQUIPMENT_STATE_CODE AS EIOSTAT, ei.EIOIFMODE, NVL(R.RACK_MAX_QTY, 0) AS RACK_MAX_QTY, NVL(R.USABLE_QTY, 0) AS USABLE_QTY, NVL(R.USING_QTY, 0) AS USING_QTY, NVL(R.DISABLE_QTY, 0) AS DISABLE_QTY FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST e INNER JOIN TB_EGN_EQUIP_INFO ei ON E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = EI.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE AND e.EQUIPMENT_ID = ei.EQUIPMENT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT T.EQPTID, T.OPTM_LOAD_RATE, COUNT(T.RACK_ID) AS RACK_MAX_QTY, SUM(T.EMPTY_RACK) AS USABLE_QTY, SUM(T.USING_RACK) AS USING_QTY, SUM(T.DISABLE_RACK) AS DISABLE_QTY FROM (SELECT CR.EQPTID, PW.OPTM_LOAD_RATE, CR.RACK_ID, CASE WHEN CR.RACK_STAT_CODE = 'USABLE' AND NVL(CR.MCS_CST_ID, '') = '' AND CR.FIRE_OCCR_FLAG = 'N' AND CR.USE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS EMPTY_RACK, CASE WHEN CR.RACK_STAT_CODE = 'USING' AND CR.FIRE_OCCR_FLAG = 'N' AND CR.USE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS USING_RACK, CASE WHEN CR.RACK_STAT_CODE = 'DISABLE' OR CR.FIRE_OCCR_FLAG = 'Y' OR CR.USE_FLAG = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DISABLE_RACK FROM TB_MMD_PRDT_WH PW INNER JOIN TB_MMD_RACK MR ON MR.FACILITY_CODE = PW.FACILITY_CODE AND PW.WH_ID = MR.WH_ID AND PW.USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND MR.USE_FLAG = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_MHS_RACK CR ON CR.FACILITY_CODE = PW.FACILITY_CODE AND CR.RACK_ID = MR.RACK_ID AND CR.USE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE PW.FACILITY_CODE = @AREA_ID) T GROUP BY T.EQPTID, T.OPTM_LOAD_RATE) R ON e.EQUIPMENT_ID = R.EQPTID WHERE E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = @AREA_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID = 'STO' AND E.EQPT_GR_TYPE_CODE = @StockerCommonCode ORDER BY e.EQUIPMENT_ID;
